title: Angular Pipe with Spectator spec Options Schema
description: Creates a new generic pipe definition in the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the new pipe.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the pipe?

path.description: The path at which to create the interface that defines the pipe, relative to the workspace root.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

skipImport.description: When true, does not import this pipe into the owning NgModule.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

export.description: When true, the declaring NgModule exports this pipe.

jest.description: When true, uses Jest to create mocks.
